lead_paragraph: After moving to Astoria in 2012, the landscape photographer Bryan Formhals set out to create a visual vocabulary of Queens as a way to convey the borough’s uniqueness.

headline.main: A Journey Through Queens With the Photographer Bryan Formhals

snippet: After moving to Astoria in 2012, the landscape photographer Bryan Formhals set out to create a visual vocabulary of Queens as a way to convey the borough’s uniqueness.
abstract: Landscape photographer Bryan Formhals depicts Queens as borough where people seem to move through air.
